titles.title: Prisoner Incentive Act of 2013
To amend title 18, United States Code, with respect to the good time credit toward service of sentences of imprisonment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary
